Product Name: Hayward PV50 Navigator Pro Swimming Pool Cleaner
Product Description:
Hayward  PV50 Navigator Pro Swimming Pool Cleaner(With 5 Year Warranty)

An intelligent, efficient and thorough swimming pool cleaner, the Hayward Navigator Pro Swimming Pool Cleaner is perfect for the discerning swimming pool owner who wants a quiet, fast and diligent cleaner for a sparklingly clear pool.

The Hayward Navigator Pro Swimming Pool Cleaner moves in a series of predetermined left and right turns to provide an orderly and complete coverage of the surface of your swimming pool. With its exclusive SmartDrive technology, the Hayward Navigator Pro benefits from speed, power and complete effectiveness, making it a terrific investment for in ground and above ground swimming pools.

The exclusive SmartDrive technology also provides a steering system, ensuring that the average sized pool can be cleaned in less than 3-4 hours. Compared to other suction cleaners, the technology also provides for a silent, peaceful operation for a pleasant pool environment.

As the Hayward Navigation Pro Swimming Pool Cleaner is powered by your existing filtration system, you’ll save on the expense of an energy consuming booster pump and can also enjoy complete effortless, straight forward operations, meaning that you won’t need to empty or replace any debris bags.

Setting the standard for high performance swimming pool cleaning, the Hayward Navigator Pro Swimming Pool Cleaner is suitable for above ground and in ground pools of all types, shapes and sizes.

Please note: Requires a minimum of 3/4 HP pump for correct operation.

Hayward Swimming Pool Cleaner Features:

  • Exclusive Hayward Smart Drive programmed steering pattern ensures the entire pool is cleaned quickly and completely
  • Unique turbine/gearing system provides constant and balanced water flow assuring quiet operation and gentle movement across the pool bottom
  • Wider cleaning path handles pollen, sand, twigs, leaves and pebbles with ease
  • Longer wearing components (wings, flaps and shoes) for additional product longevity
  • Streamlined head design in deep maroon (vinyl) and Silverado grey.
  • Installs in less than 15 minutes, without tools

 

A simple guide to the Hayward Navigator Pro Pool Cleaner

Product Description:
Sta-Rite 5P2R Swimming Pool Pump

With about 80 years worth of experience under their belt, you can always rely on Sta-Rite products to be of premier quality and to provide a dependable, solid performance every time and for an enduring lifespan.

The Sta-Rite 5P2R Swimming Pool Pump delivers just that; resistant to temperature and corrosion, moulded of fibreglass reinforcement, and featuring exceptionally strong thermoplastic, it’s designed for an outstanding pressure operation that is unparalleled in the industry.

Comprising of inner parts completely constructed of high grade stainless steel (or thermoplastic material), the Sta-Rite 5P2R also comes with a special motor shaft and is capable of flow rates of up to 22m3/h and higher heads of up to 22.5 metres.

Sta-Rite 5P2R Swimming Pool Pump Features

  • Self-priming diffuser design
  • ‘Hi-Rise’ Mounting Base
  • High Head Impeller: precision moulded of glass filled polycarbonate, it provides unusually smooth water passages for outstanding performance and efficiency
  • Heavy Duty Motor: 50 Hz motors are designed for continuous and quiet operation, feature stainless steel shaft, sealed and permanently lubricated bearings: runs cooler for prolonged life under high ambient conditions
  • Mechanical Seal: precision lapped and highly polished carbon ceramic stainless steel construction, it assures maximum drip proof corrosion
  • free protection
  • Stainless Steel Pump Champ: easily removed for quick access to all serviceable components
  • ‘See Thru’ trap lid: designed to withstand 4 bar test pressure as well as high vacuum conditions
  • Big lock-in 5” basket

Hayward Super Pump Swimming Pool Pump

Ideal as a new installation or to replace an existing pump, the Hayward Super Pump features an exclusive service-ease design for extra convenience, a large transparent strainer and a substantial debris basket.

  • Resists chemical and saline corrosion under normal use conditions.

Product Name: Astral Victoria Plus New Generation Swimming Pool Pump
Product Description:
Astral Victoria Plus New Generation Swimming Pool Pump

A replacement for the popular Sprint, Victoria and Victoria Plus pool pumps

The Astral Victoria Plus New Generation Swimming Pool Pump has been introduced with the core aim of providing better support for the pump and the motor as required with lower noise levels, these Astral new generation pool pumps are suitable for both commercial and domestic use, delivering a consistent high performance all the time, every time, and features a sturdy design that guarantees it for endurance.

Quiet running

Amongst its many features and capabilities are a user friendly lid locking nut, rubber paddings to substantially reduce noise levels, a generously sized strainer basket (5 litre capacity) and IP-55 motor protection.

Complete with imperial & metric fittings

The Astral Victoria Plus Swimming Pool Pump also comes complete with metric and imperial connections, as well as a prefilter cover and features metal parts built from durable stainless steel.

See the video below

 Other Features

  • Flow rates give for 8M head at 1/2 HP and 10 head from 3/4 onwards. 3'000 rpm.
  • Low noise levels: between 61-70 dBA
  • The Astral Victoria Plus New Generation pump was formerly the Astral Victoria, Victoria Plus and also the Astral Sprint.

Please note that the baseplate differs slightly to the Victoria plus but pipe connections are the same

Product Name: PAL Disabled Lift Portable Swimming Pool Hoist
Product Description:
PAL Portable Disabled Swimming Pool Hoist

For use by individuals with physical disabilities in commercial, residential, hospitality, and recreational settings, the PAL Portable Disabled Swimming Pool Hoist is a completely portable accessibility lift which doesn’t require mounting to a swimming pool deck and is a terrific solution for facilities with multiple swimming pools.

Easy to use, reliable and convenient to position and pack away

The PAL Disabled Swimming Pool Hoist can be placed anywhere along the pool decking and can then be easily packed away when not in use. The PAL Disabled Swimming Pool Hoist also benefits from straightforward usability meaning that it can be operated by either an attendant or the user, with complete ease.

With a waterproof hand control and a rechargeable 24 volt battery (which powers the screw driven actuator of the lifting mechanism), the PAL Portable Disabled Swimming Pool Hoist is ensured for reliable and consistent operations (more so than hydraulic water powered swimming pool lifts), so it works every time you want it to.

Setting Up, Using and Packing Away the PAL Portable Disabled Swimming Pool Hoist:

  • To use the PAL Disabled Swimming Pool Hoist simply roll it to the edge of the pool, lock the wheels, set the stabilisers and it’s ready to go – the swimming pool hoist is then capable of turning a 240 radius, to ensure for completely safe transfers from the pool’s edge.  
  • When not in use, the PAL Swimming Pool Hoist can be packed away by retracting the arm, slipping the holding pin out to release the seat, and then putting the seat on the inside the arm.

Product Name: Above Ground Swimming Pool Overlap Liners
Product Description:
Above Ground Swimming Pool Overlap Liners

An Above Ground Overlap Swimming Pool Liner is perfect for use as a replacement liner or as the first liner on a new pool. An overlap liner does exactly what the name implies, and folds (or overlaps) over the pool wall and is then secured onto the exterior.  

A basic guide to installing your overlap liner successfully:

  • Whatever you do, don’t attempt to install a liner on a windy day! As these are stretch in liners, the ideal weather conditions for them are warm and dry. The liner will be far more malleable and easy to install in this kind of weather – anything less than warm and dry and you could find yourself struggling to install a cold, brittle and inflexible liner!
  • It’s important to make sure that you prepare the base well prior to installation. Remove imperfections in the soil with dust or fine chippings, and also completely clear any debris from the site.
  • When creating your one piece floor with polystyrene sheets (taped together into place with fibre tape), make sure that they’re inside but not under the metal wall.

For more information regarding overlap liners, installation or even advice about installing a replacement liner, please give us a call on: 0151 334 0222.

Liner Thickness:

  • 17 thou (Wall thickness)
  • 13 thou (Floor thickness)

Product Name: Dometic RF60 3 way Camping & Caravan Awning Fridge 12v/mains/lpg
Product Description:
Dometic RF60 Portable Camping and Caravan Awning Fridge

Assured for complete convenience and versatility, the Dometic RF60 portable camping awning fridge is a dynamic portable camping and caravan awning fridge, enhanced for mobility and complete security.

Offering full flexibility through function and operation, the Dometic RF60 awning fridge has adjustable shelves and runs on 12v DC, 230v AC and LPG gas to suit your power availability and storage needs.

The Dometic RF-60 portable camping awning fridge has the capacity to keep your food essentials, drinks (and added luxuries!) cool, with 61 litres worth of space provided for use, and also features a locking door (with vent) to keep your goods secure while in transit.

Thanks to its noiseless operations you needn’t worry about the Dometic RF60 portable camping awning fridge disturbing your sleep or a well rewarded bit of quiet time, and with its thermostat temperature regulation you can be sure that this outstanding portable fridge will always achieve the desired temperature regardless of the influences of changing weather.

Dometic RF60 3 Way Fridge Features:

  • Piezo ignition
  • Thermostat regulation in 230-volt & gas mode
  • Two door shelves
  • Adjustable shelves
  • Flame indicator
  • Door locking with vent option

 Note: The RF-60 is not designed to be built in, this is a standalone (freestanding) fridge ideal for use in awnings etc.

Product Name: Shurflo Trail King Caravan Motorhome Pressurised Water Pump
Product Description:
Shurflo Trail King Water Pump

The Shurflo Trail King Water Pump is an efficient and robust 12v pressurised fresh water pump suitable for use in caravans and motorhomes. Fully automatic, it is energy efficient and can even run dry without damage.

Well designed features

Featuring an automatic triple diaphragm, it is a self-priming pump with an integral pressure switch and low amp draw, which is capable of running dry without damage.

Quiet running

The Shurflo caravan and motorhome water pump is quiet to run and therefore operates unobtrusively. Other features include an internal circuit breaker within the motor for overload protection, as well as a robust die cast alloy lower housing with twin ball bearing drive.

Connectors and pipes

Now supplied with optional fittings, the Shurflo Trail King comes with one angled hose connector and one straight hose connector to fit a 12mm diameter flexible hose. Note: You will need to order the length of 12mm water pipe separately by following the link here.

Alternatively, the Shurflo pump can also be supplied with two John Guest fittings. These fitting are only compatible with John Guest pipe and are not suitable for 12mm flexible hose.

All Shurflo Trail King Pumps are water tested by Shurlfo in their factory prior to shipping. Some residual water may be present during installation. This is not a fault or sign of previous use.

Product Description:
Dometic Power Pump

Designed specifically for use in caravans, motorhomes and boats, the Dometic Power Pump excels with durability, pragmatic features and unobtrusive, quiet operations.

Doing just as the name implies, this water pumps provide consistent powerful performance, and thanks to the impressive four-chamber diaphragm design is ensured for maintenance free operations during its entire service lifespan.

Product Name: Elecro Vulcan Analogue Electric Swimming Pool Heater
Product Description:
Elecro Vulcan Electric Analogue Swimming Pool Heater

The Elecro Vulcan Electric Analogue Pool Heater is a steadfast, straightforward swimming pool heater that benefits from being of a robust, durable build and being simple and easy to install. With the Elecro Vulcan Electric Analogue Pool Heater you’re guaranteed a trustworthy, high performance product with added features for versatility, protection and control.

A thermostat dial positioned on the front of the heater allows you to manage the temperature on your Elecro Vulcan Swimming Pool Heater with ease whilst swivel feet support permit for either wall or floor mounting. For complete peace of mind, the Elecro Vulcan Electric Analogue Pool Heater is also safety and equipment protected by a reversible and reliable flow switch as well as a thermal cut that protects against over temperature.

Product Name: Victron Energy BlueSolar PWM 12/24v Charge Controller
Product Description:
Victron BlueSolar PWM 12/24v Charge Controller

Ready for use even in default settings

Ideal for users with minimal energy requirements (using smaller or single solar panels), the Victron BlueSolar Charge Controller is an affordable PWM controller that features a three-stage battery charging (bulk, absorption and float) and is a well built, straight forward unit for regulating power from your solar panel to your deep cycle leisure battery.

Features:

  • Lighting control function
  • Integrated battery monitor
  • Day/Night timing option

High quality and robust, the Victron BlueSolar 12/24v PWM Charge Controller also features an internal temperature sensor as well as a variety of safety features to protect against over current, short circuiting, and reverse polarity connection of the solar panels and / or battery.

The BlueSolar 12/24 charge controller (5Amp/10Amp) is compatible for use with our caravan/motorhome solar panels.

The 5Amp controller is only to be used with panels up to 80 Watts (36 Cells). The 10-amp Victron Charge Controller is for use with a solar panel or panels totalling no more than 160 Watts (72 Cells).

Product Description:
BMV 602S Dual Battery Monitor Kit

Programmed with the sort of vital algorithms required to provide absolute precision monitoring, the BMV 602S Dual Battery Monitor Kit is based on a powerful microprocessor to supply exact calculations of ampere-hours consumption and the state of charge of your battery.

With the capacity to measure the voltage of a second battery, the BMV 602 Dual Battery Monitor Kit displays information about the battery voltage (V), Battery charge / Discharge Current (A), Ampere-hours consumed (Ah), the state of charge (%), and also the amount of time left at current states of discharge.

The BMV 602S Dual Battery Monitor Kit also comes supplied with a programmable alarm (generator start relay) as well as a visual and audio alarm that can alert you as to when the battery has discharged or states of over and under voltage.

Easy to wire and install, the BMV 602S Dual Battery Monitor Kit comes complete with all the components required for a full and simple set up including a 10 meter RJ 12 UTP cable, shunt, 2 meter battery cable with fuse, as well as a front bezel for a square or round appearance, a ring for rear mounting and screws for front mounting.

Product Name: Above Ground Swimming Pool Solar Covers
Product Description:
200 Micron Solar Covers for Above Ground Pools

Solar covers heat the pool, help retain pool heat when a heater is used, act as a debris cover and while on the pool slow down chlorine dissipation.  In short it's a no brainer not to have one.

Solar covers heat the pool and are ideal for Intex and Bestway pools

An above ground pool without heating or a solar cover is always cold even in warm weather. Bestway and Intex owners especially note, a solar cover on its own definitely takes the bite off the pool and in great weather brings the pool up to a nice temperature. Having a heater on your pool without a solar cover helping to retain the heat will make keeping your swimming pool warm an expensive affair.

With a Swimming Pool Solar Cover you can greatly reduce heat loss, water evaporation and chemical usage, meaning that this simple cover terrific will assist in saving you money in the long run, whilst your swimming pool will greatly benefit from a raised temperature throughout the day.

Beware cheaper covers are usually half the gauge i.e. not 200 microns but 100 microns

For customers who have Bestway and Intex pools there are other covers available on the web, EBay etc, be aware these are usually flimsy 100 micron solar covers which are pretty much 1 level up from bubble wrap, getting 1 year out of one of these swimming pool solar covers would be an achievement.

Solar Covers simply float on the surface of your swimming pool (with the bubbles face down!) and are available in various sizes to meet the specific dimensions of your pool (and may require trimming for a superlative fit).

Product Description:
400 Micron In Ground Swimming Pool Solar Covers

A simple but exceptionally beneficial pool accessory, Swimming Pool Solar Covers will not only help in raising the temperature of your pool water throughout the day, but are also instrumental in reducing heat loss, water evaporation and also chemical usage. As a result using a Swimming Pool Solar Cover on your pool will save you long term costs on utility bills and other associated swimming pool maintenance.

As much as 70% of heat loss from a swimming pool is lost through evaporation, a Swimming Pool Solar Cover, however, acts as a tremendous water vapour barrier to dramatically reduce the associated heat loss and leave you with significant energy savings as a result. 

Available in a range of sizes to suit the requirements of your swimming pool, our range of 400 Micron In Ground Swimming Pool Solar Covers simply lay flat on the surface of your swimming pool (with the bubbles facing down), provide long lasting UV stabilisation, are dark blue with a turquoise underside and come with a 3 year pro-rata warranty (UK and Eire only). Product Description:
Pool Pilot Digital Nano Plus

Effortless Pool Maintenance with Advanced Technology

The Pool Pilot® Digital Nano Plus is your ultimate solution for a hassle-free, sparkling clean pool. Designed for simplicity and efficiency, this state-of-the-art chlorinator features user-friendly microprocessor controls with a digital read-out displaying crucial information such as pool water temperature, current salt level, and purifier production level. It even notifies you when to add salt, ensuring your pool always stays perfectly balanced.

Upgrade to the Pool Pilot Digital Nano Plus and experience the ultimate in pool care convenience. Say goodbye to traditional chlorine hassles and hello to a consistently clean, comfortable, and eco-friendly swimming environment.

Key Features:

  • Low Salt Operation: Functions efficiently with salt levels as low as 2,500 ppm (2.5 kg salt per 1 m³), reducing salt consumption and maintenance costs.
  • Patented Bypass Manifold: Simplifies installation and enhances chlorine delivery, ensuring your pool stays clean with minimal effort.
  • Self-Cleaning Cell: Operates in water temperatures up to 40°C and can handle salt content up to 35,000 ppm, ensuring longevity and consistent performance.

Advanced Functionality:

  • Microprocessor Controls: Digital display provides real-time data on pool water conditions.
  • Push Button Controls: Easy-to-use interface for hassle-free operation.
  • Multi-Language Display: Digital readout available in English, Spanish, French, Italian, Czech, or German.
  • Temperature Compensation: Automatically adjusts to maintain optimal performance.
  • Boost Cycles: 24 & 72-hour boost cycles for times when extra purification is needed.
  • Soft Reverse Cell Cleaning: Prolongs cell life and maintains efficiency.
  • Flow Rate Flexibility: Operates at flow rates as low as 15 gpm (3.4 m³/h), making it adaptable to various pool types.

User Benefits:

  • Never Buy Chlorine Again: Enjoy the convenience of generating your own chlorine.
  • No More Red Eyes or Itchy Skin: Gentle on swimmers, providing a more comfortable experience.
  • Protect Your Swimwear: Prevents fading, ensuring your gear lasts longer.
  • Environmentally Friendly: Reduces the need for harsh chemicals.
  • Automatic Cleaning: Keeps the system running smoothly with minimal maintenance.
  • Worry-Free Vacations: Maintains your pool effortlessly, even when you're away.
  • Energy Efficient: Saves on operational costs while keeping your pool pristine.
  • Silky Soft Water: Enhances the swimming experience with water that feels luxurious on your skin.

Specifications:

  • Weight: 22 lbs
  • Dimensions: 13 × 18 × 8 in
  • Cell Type: PPC1 Cell
  • Pool Size: Suitable for pools up to 28,000 gallons (106 m³)
  • Unit Includes: Power Supply, PPC1 manifold, cables, and manuals
  • Voltage: 110V or 220V convertible power supply
  • Physical Dimensions: 5 x 10 x 13 in
  • Physical Weight: 8 lbs

Note: Please check compatibility of heating equipment prior to installation.

Product Name: Zodiac TRi Salt Swimming Pool Chlorinator
Product Description:
Zodiac TRI Salt Chlorinator and PH Controller

Enjoy simplified and reliable pool maintenance courtesy of a Zodiac Tri Salt Chlorinator and Ph Controller, an all in one and straightforward, complete chlorination and pH system.

Featuring an ample backlit LCD display as well as a programmable clock with which to adjust filtration and chlorine production times to perfectly meet your requirements, the Zodiac TRi Salt Chlorinator and Ph Controller is accommodatingly user friendly and makes monitoring straight forward and simple.

Featuring an autonomous system of two modes (low and boost), the Zodiac Tri Salt Chlorinator can reduce the production of chlorine manually or automatically, for covered pools, or boost production during intensive pool usage.

Also provided with the Zodiac TRi Salt Chlorinator and pH Controller are adjustable reversal time periods for hard water areas, a cell incorporated flow switch, super chlorination at the touch of a button and a superb 3 year unconditional warranty for complete and dependable quality assurance.

Product Name: Certikin Swim Flo HGS Swimming Pool Pump
Product Description:
Certikin SwimFlo HGS Swimming Pool Pump

Powerful yet uncomplicated, the Certikin SwimFlo HGS Swimming Pool Pump provides straight forward, quiet and efficient operation alongside a completely solid, resistant build. The Certikin Swimflo HGS Swimming Pool Pump is also available in a range of horsepower options (0.5 HP to 1.5 HP) and voltage configurations (220V single-phase or 380V three-phase) to suit various pool sizes and requirements.

Key Features:

The Certikin HGS Pool Pump utilises a precision-balanced impeller that cuts through water with minimal resistance, maximizing flow without straining the motor. High-quality bearings further reduce friction and noise, making the HGS surprisingly energy efficient. This optimized design translates to powerful filtration, keeping your pool crystal-clear while saving you money on electricity.

Embrace tranquil poolside moments with the Certikin HGS Swimming Pool Pump. It whispers, rather than shouts, thanks to innovative noise reduction technology. At just 60 decibels at a meter away, the HGS's hum is softer than a normal conversation, allowing you to unwind without the constant drone of machinery. Enjoy lively poolside chats, soak up the sun's warmth, or listen to the gentle splash of water - all without battling intrusive noise.

The Certikin HGS isn't just about powerful filtration; it's about enduring performance. Made from corrosion-resistant materials, it stands strong against the harsh chemicals and salt-laden environments that can wear down ordinary pool pumps. Making the Certikin HGS Swimming pool pump perfect for salt water environments and setups.

Say goodbye to the tedious task of manual priming with the Certikin HGS. Its improved self-priming technology gets the water flowing quickly and effortlessly, without you needing to break a sweat.

Benefits for You:

  • Crystal-Clear Water: Enjoy consistently clean and sparkling water thanks to powerful filtration.
  • Uninterrupted Relaxation: Unwind in serene poolside tranquility with whisper-quiet operation.
  • Reduced Energy Costs: Optimized performance minimizes energy consumption, leading to lower operating costs.
  • Reliable Long-Term Value: Durable construction and corrosion resistance ensure years of dependable service.
  • Effortless Maintenance: Self-priming technology simplifies pool maintenance.

Product Name: Solar Pod Plus Swimming Pool Heater
Product Description:
Swimming Pool Solar Heating Pod Plus

The bigger brother of the standard sized Solar Heating Pod, the Eco Swimming Pool Solar Heating Pod Plus is capable of achieving larger solar gains thanks to its increased size and dome surface area. As a result, the Solar Pod Plus is a superbly efficient, larger sized unit that can contract an increased volume of the suns natural energy to provide you with more power per pod to effectively heat your swimming pool.

Ideal for use with both most above ground and in ground swimming pools, the Swimming Pool Solar Heating Pod Plus features a transparent polycarbonate dome that reduces heat loss from the wind, and retains heat superbly, making them ultra efficient heating devices for your swimming pool. To further boost the capabilities of your pod, the Swimming Pool Solar Heating Pod Plus can be tilted in order to utilise the best angle for sunshine.

Easy to install and only requiring a Philips screwdriver and silicon lubricant to carry out installation, the Solar Heating Pod Plus is also low maintenance, needing no servicing apart from winterising. 

 

Swimming Pool Solar Heat Pods Plus are incredibly space efficient due to their compact design, and as a result are perfect for use in areas where room might be limited. Set them up on a roof close to the pool, or next to the actual swimming pool itself – their sleek, stylish design mean that they won’t intrude on the aesthetics of your swimming pool area.

We recommend that customers phone for advice on solar pods prior to purchase, as there’s quite a bit to consider regarding the quantity of solar pods required for your specific pool size as well as positioning of the solar pods (i.e. installation on roofs or in positions away from the filtration system can require more powerful pumps). Tel 0151 334 0222.

The Eco Swimming Pool Solar Heating Pod Plus Kit Includes:

  • Main base with stand
  • 1.25” to 1.5” hose reducer
  • Collared tube adaptor
  • Hose clamps
  • Thick connector gasket
  • 1m hose
  • Side hose connector x 2
  • 380mm hose
  • Clear dome
  • Solar protection cover
  • 780mm x 780mm x 450mm
  • 1 x Pod plus is suitable for 9,000 litres

Product Name: Relax Swimming Pool Chemicals 5kg pH+ Plus
Product Description:
Swimming Pool pH Plus (increaser)

With Swimming Pool pH Plus you can effectively increase the pH levels of your swimming pool water.

The pH scale is the measure of acidity and alkalinity (measured from 0-14 with 7 being neutral) and controlling a balanced pH in your swimming pool with chemicals is imperative to maintaining a healthy pool environment.

A low pH value indicates a high acid content, and if it gets too low then it’s likely that corrosion will occur around the pool fittings, and worse may cause eye and skin irritation. Using Swimming Pool pH Plus in your swimming pool will increase pH levels to restore a healthy, balanced water environment so that both your pool and the people using it will be safe and protected.

Product Name: Relax 7kg pH minus swimming pool chemical
Product Description:
7kg Swimming Pool pH Minus (decreaser)

The pH scale is the measure of acidity and alkalinity, measured between 0 and 14, with 7 being neutral (and the optimum pH level to aim for in your swimming pool).

A high pH value indicates a high alkaline content, which can damage the effectiveness of your disinfectant (chlorine) and cause a resulting scale formation, cloudy water and reduce the capabilities of the filter.

With Swimming Pool pH Minus pool chemicals you can efficiently decrease the pH levels of your swimming pool in order to restore the water to a safe, balanced pH level, thus protecting your swimming pool system and maintaining a pleasant water environment for yourself, friends or family to enjoy.

Product Description:
Clear‘N’Clean Swimming Pool Algaecide

Clear’N’Clean Swimming Pool Algaecide is a chemical formulation specifically designed to reduce the amount of maintenance required for your pool, killing algae and most plant life found in pool water and controlling green, black and mustard algae.

Without algae presence, chlorine consumption will be reduced by up to 20%, and a single dose of Clear’N’Clean will keep your swimming pool water clear from algae for up to 6 months.

Clear’N’Clean Swimming Pool Algaecide is a perfect product for swimming pools that aren’t used for long periods of time or for an essential reduction in maintenance requirements.

1 litre is sufficient to treat 6,500 gallons or 29,000 litres.

Product Description:
AquaChek 4-Way Swimming Pool Testing Strips

An all in one testing strip for checking the levels of Chlorine, Cyanuric Acid, pH and Total Alkalinity in your swimming pool water, AquaChek 4-Way Swimming Pool Testing Strips give you reliable results in seconds.

Pack of 50

With 50 strips per bottle and a flip cap dispenser, AquaChek 4-Way Swimming Pool Testing Strips couldn’t be easier to use; Simply dip an AquaChek strip into your swimming pool for one second, remove it immediately and compare the resulting strip colour with the colour chart to examine the results!

In order to maintain the quality of your swimming pool to the very best of standards, it’s highly advisable to test the water at each end of the pool at least twice a week (and, if you’re testing the water of a spa, to test prior to each use). We also recommend that you write down your results following each test so that you can monitor changes in water levels.

Product Description:
Jolly Gel Flocculent for Swimming Pool

Reduce chlorine consumption and remove miniscule particles of dust and algae spores with Jelly Gel Flocculent for Swimming Pools.

To use, simply place the required sized cube in the swimming pool pump or strainer basket and the Jolly Gel Flocculent will slowly dissolve as the swimming pool water passes on its journey to the filter.

Placing a porous, clear membrane screen over the filer media, Jolly Gel Flocculent penetrates the bed to an average depth of about 15cms and will remove even the finest particles of dust and algae spores from your swimming pool.

Product Name: El Nino Solar Swimming Pool Heating Kit
Product Description:
El Niño Solar Pool Heating For Intex Type Swimming Pools

A solar heating system that can pay for itself in one season!

All splasher and Intex type swimming pools have the same requirements as any other pool - they need heat! By investing in an El Niño Solar Heating System you can expect to increase your swimming pool temperature by approximately 7-10 deg C throughout the summer.

In addition to enhancing your bathing experience, El Niño is also an economical and environmentally friendly investment. The expensive alternative is using domestic electricity (3kW electric heater approx 25p per hour) to achieve a comfortable bathing temperature.

Advantages of the EL Nino Swimming Pool Solar Heating system:

  • Suitable for most above ground or splasher swimming pools (Intex Bestway etc) and not recommended for pools with sand filters (for advice ring 0151 334 0222)
  • Pays for itself in one year
  • Low weight, easy to use
  • Easy to store when not in use
  • Uses existing filter pump - no expensive or complicated installations
  • Economical and environmentally friendly

El Nino Basic Solar pool Heating Kit Includes:

  • Solar collector unit - 2 pieces of solar collectors (panels)
  • Coupling devices (Connects the solar panels to the pool)

Note: Garden hose 12mm [1/2"] is needed to connect the solar collector to the pool. Garden hose is not included. Intended for use with existing pool pump. Pump not included.

El Nino Expansion Kit Includes:

  • One Extra Solar Collector (Panel)

135W Automatic Fridge Power Switch

The Dometic 135W Mains Adaptor for UK Refrigerators is used for connecting 12V/24V fridges to 100V-240V mains power sockets. Designed with a compact size, this mains adaptor remains hidden from view and is easy to install. The DPS-R adapts to all Dometic 12/24 DC refrigerators (up to 135W), making it an ideal purchase alongside your fridge. Effortlessly transition from battery to mains power with no interruption to your fridge, keeping your food fresh and your drinks cold. Used for connecting your fridge to a UK mains power socket for reliable power. This unit features mains priority when permanently connected, automatically switching to mains when it's detected and back to low voltage when hook up is lost or disconnected.

When connected to 100V-240V mains, your fridge will automatically switch from battery power to mains power, saving time from unplugging your battery. Featuring an intelligent chip that recognises when mains power is available to save battery power. Utilising your battery for portability or for when the power goes out. Fitted with a 230-volt UK plug (UK three-pin plug) for the inlet mains power, and two pre-stripped wires for connecting to the 12/24V input.

DPS-R 135 Key Features

  • UK mains power (three-pin plug)
  • Works with all NRX fridges, regardless of size
  • Included in the box:
    • 1 x adaptor
    • 1 x DC magnetic cable
    • 1 x AC plug
    • 1 x mounting bracket
    • 2 x screws
    • 1 x manual

Product Name: Dometic RGE2100 Free Standing Gas Fridge
Product Description:
Dometic RGE2100 Free Standing Gas Fridge

Discontinued

With its unwavering high performance, complete durability and convenient features, the Dometic RGE2100 Free Standing Gas Fridge is an exceptional absorption refrigerator that provides consistent cooling anytime, anywhere.

Efficient, tough and enduring

The Dometic RGE2100 Caravan Fridge can be easily switched to LP gas mode when an electric power supply isn’t available, ensuring that all the contents of your fridge remain continually cool and fresh. Thanks to its tough construction, including a cabinet door built from galvanised steel and fully insulated walls, the Dometic RGE2100 delivers an outstanding cooling performance and unfaltering endurance.

Enhanced for complete convenience

Suitable for permanent installation in your caravan or motorhome, the Dometic RGE2100 Free Standing Gas Fridge features a removable freezer compartment and partitioned storage for fruit and vegetables. Also included are coated adjustable shelves, a reversible door hinge and the added benefit of a control panel featuring a protection cover for the electric and gas thermostat.

A 2-way absorption refrigerator for 230 volts and LPG gas

With a gross capacity of 96 litres, including 9 litres for the freezer, the Dometic RGE2100 works silently on electric and near-silent on gas for unobtrusive operations and can be run on mains or gas, with piezo ignition for gas operation featuring a flame safety valve.

Points of note:

  • Dometic RGE fridges run silent on electric. When running on gas the noise of the burner/gas pressure is near-silent however fluctuates based on demand to ensure maximum efficiency and performance.
  • The RGE series of gas fridges do not have a flue
  • The room must have a cubic capacity of at least 20m³, and be well ventilated with an opening window near by.
  • The RGE fridge has to be mounted free-standing, meaning a minimum space to surrounding walls or furniture of 50mm (no built in)
  • The RGE fridge must not be exposed to heat radiation (e.g. oven, radiator)
  • The cooling unit on the backside (covered) has to be well ventilated continuously. Do not cover the cooling unit (e.g. towels, curtains).
  • RGE’s should be connected by a Gas Safe registered engineer.
  • When the fridge is first connected there maybe a strong smell. This is the burning off of paint at the back of the cooling system. This can smell like a strong pungent chemical smell. After a day or two there may be a slight smell which should not bother you.
  • Fridge will take 2 – 4 hours after connecting to start to get cold (depending on ambient temperature).
  • Comes with right hand hinge as standard
Product Availability: # Unfortunately, the Dometic RGE2100 has been discontinued

Product Name: Waeco Coolair RT880 Truck Air Conditioner Unit
Product Description:
Waeco Coolair RT880 Truck Air Conditioner

The Waeco Coolair RT880 Truck Air Conditioner is a self-contained unit that provides the fantastic benefit of having all of its components integrated in a compact housing. Due to the closed and airtight system, installation is instantly quicker and easier to perform and also makes maintenance unnecessary with no need for refrigerant filling. 

With an elegant finish (that can be spray painted at a later date to match the colour of your vehicle) and vehicle specific installation kits available, the Waeco Coolair RT880 Truck Air Conditioner fits almost every truck and delivers an exceptional cooling performance.

For complete and straightforward usability the Waeco RT880 Air Conditioner also comes with an easy to use Operating Panel, giving you complete control and monitoring over temperature and operations.

*Please note that there are two different models available to accommodate for the roof style of your truck: 0 Degrees (for flat roofs) and 12 Degrees (for curved roofs).

**Prior to checkout please make your choice of which particular model and installation kit you require to fit your lorry from the drop down menus at the top of the page.

***Should you have any questions or require further advice about the Waeco Coolair RT880 Air Conditioner then please give us a ring on 0151 334 0222.

Requires additional vehicle specific fixing kit for installation

The functional and easy to use Operating Panel of the Waeco RT880

  1. ON / OFF switch
  2. LED red: warning indicator
  3. LED green: unit in operation
  4. LED yellow: compressor in operation
  5. Operation mode setting
  6. Digital status readout
  7. Temperature set buttons

Product Name: Certikin Sealed Beam Underwater Swimming Pool Lights
Product Description:
Certikin Sealed Beam Underwater Swimming Pool Lights

Incorporating features that make it unique to other underwater systems, these Certikin Sealed Beam Underwater Swimming Pool Lights include Micallef fittings at the niche and a deck box to enable for non-standard conduit lengths to be fitted during installation.

Every Certikin Underwater Swimming Pool light comes complete with a factory fitted clear polycarbonate safety cover and includes a finishing facia ring.

With their slotted screw heads, locating lugs and corrosion resistant nickel plate inserts making bulb changing simple and easy, the Certikin Sealed Beam Swimming Pool Lights can also be positioned for the optimum light effect (without glare!) at the poolside. This is thanks to the smartly designed niche which can be angled down by 5 degrees.

There are two different versions of the Certikin Sealed Beam Underwater Light available: a liner/shutter version which clips onto the clamp plate to hide unsightly screw heads and a concrete version which is easily fitted to the niche surround, designed to cover tiling edges.

Certikin Sealed Beam Underwater Swimming Pool Lights Features:

  • Slim light and niche
  • Light internals "guts" can be installed in older style light niches
  • Corrosion resistant front plate inserts made of brass / nickel
  • Micallef style gland inside the niche prevents water from entering the conduit
  • IP68 rated built-in gland on the light housing to eliminate need for hot melt compounds
  • Locating lugs and combi housing screws make bulb changing easier
  • Threaded conduit fitting on back of niche for ease of installation
  • Clip-on faceplate on liner light to cover unsightly screws
  • Easy to secure cover plates to finish off concrete pool light
  • Vandal proof lens
  • Each light installation should have a minimum cable run of 5 metres from transformer to deck box

*Please use the drop down menu at the top of the page to make your preference of sealed beam light (concrete or liner pool) as well as light guts and varying cable lengths prior to checkout.

Small Fibre Optic LED Light Star Effect Ceiling Kit
Option Set: Small Star Kit SS12 +1 Tail Length
Product Description:
Small Fibre Optic LED Light and Halogen Star Effect Ceiling Kit

Typically installed in the ceilings of small bedrooms and bathrooms, the Small Fibre Optic LED Light Star Effect Ceiling Kit is available in two different models and with three different options for LED lighting sources

Whilst there's no hard or fast rule as to how many fibre optic LED lights should be allocated to each square metre, or if lights should be spread evenly or not, it’s worth knowing that if you're trying to create a star lit sky effect then lights should be spread randomly to add to this effect (we generally recommend using 15 to 18 lights per sq metre), SEE THE IMAGE AT THE BOTTOM OF THIS PAGE.

Options;

SS12 or SS12+1

You must choose one of these options, this is the kit with standard length tails or with an extra 1 metre added to each length.

Twinkle wheel (Twinkling Star Lights)

This kit comprises halogen light box with twinkle wheel and tails.  Once turned on the wheel turns (inside the light box) in front of the light causing the twinkle affect which appears at the end of each tail.  Its “blue and white” twinkle wheel gives the best "twinkling star affect” for your ceiling. Each kit includes optional lenses, having a mix of lights with and without lenses randomly scattered across the ceiling adds to a "real" star affect.

Colour Changing (Manual Control)

This star ceiling kit has an LED light source (light box) and provides an RGBW sequence (red green blue white), it can be manually set on the light box to stay at a fixed colour or go through a set colour change sequence.  Remember you will need access to the box if you want to change the setting, if it’s in your loft you’ll have to get up to change it.

Colour Changing (with Remote Control)

This LED light star ceiling kit has a remote control which can turn the lights on/off, set a fixed colour or change to an RBG colour changing sequence, the brightness can also be adjusted with the remote. The LED light kits do not have a twinkling affect!

112 Light points

The Small Star Effect Ceiling Light Kit features 112 Star Points with fibre lengths ranging from 1.2m to 2m, this has the option for an extra metre to be added to these lengths, available with a choice of three different light sources (Twinkle Wheel, Manual Colour Changer or Colour Changer with remote control). Please pick your selection using the option set at the top of the page prior to checkout.

Product Name: Relax Stabilised Swimming Pool Chlorine Granules 1kg Pouch
Product Description:
Relax Stabilised Chlorine Granules 1kg Pouch

It's vital that the water of your swimming pool or spa is kept chlorinated at all times. These Stabilised chlorine granules can be added to your swimming pool or spa to maintain a healthy standard of sanitation in your water and kill off any bacteria. These Stabilised Chlorine Granules come in an environmentally friendly, airtight and conveniently resealable pouch.

*Granules need to be pre-dissolved in a clean plastic bucket filled with pool or spa water prior to use.
General Precautions:

  • Please only use as directed via the instructions and dosages suggested on the packet
  • Never mix directly with any other pool chemicals (including cleaning products, weed killers and other chlorine products)
  • Only ever pre-dissolve stabilised chlorine granules in a clean, plastic container (and if in doubt, wash thoroughly!) and always add the product to water and not vice versa
  • Always handle in a well ventilated area, preferably outdoors
  • Wash hands thoroughly after handling pool chemicals
  • Store in a cool, dry place

Product Name: Relax 1kg Swimming Pool Total Alkalinity Plus Granules Pouch
Product Description:
Relax 1kg Total Alkalinity Plus Pool Chemicals Pouch

Ideal water conditions for swimming pools feature a total alkalinity level between 80 – 140ppm. Relax 1kg Total Alkalinity Plus Chemicals Plus raises the levels of total alkalinity on swimming pool or spa water when they drop below 80ppm (which can sometimes result in corrosive and damaging water levels!).

Add Relax 1kg Total Alkilinity Plus to the water of your swimming pool or spa water to raise total alkilinity levels to a healthy level!

Supplied in a simple, resealable and eco-friendly pouch that can be reused time and again, these economic packs also ensure that pool chemicals remain free of moisture in an airtight seal.

Relax 1.5kg pH Minus Swimming Pool Chemical Pouch

One of the most important elements of swimming pool or spa water maintenance is ensuring that water is kept at consistently healthy and balanced levels. Relax 1.5kg pH Minus Swimming Pool Chemical Pouch can prevent damage to your pool equipment and ensure effective sanitation by reducing pH levels to a healthy level of between 7.2 and 7.6 (or Total Alkalinity levels) of between 80-140ppm

Use Relax pH Minus Granules to reduce the pH or Total Alkalinity in the water of your Spa or Swimming Pool

Supplied in a convenient and eco-friendly pouch that can be sealed up and reused time and again, the economic packs of the Relax 1.5kg pH Minus Swimming Pool Chemical Pouch also ensure that the pH Minus swimming pool chemicals remain free of moisture in an airtight seal.

Product Description:
Puky Z2 Red Kids Bicycle with Stabilisers

If your child is finally ready for that exciting first bike, then look no further than the Puky Z2 Red Kids Bike.

Featuring stabilisers for extra support, the Puky Z2 Childrens Bicycle in Red provides complete safety and stability whilst your child learns to ride a real bicycle and is a stunningly designed bicycle made to look just like a grown up ride.

The Puky Z2 Red Childrens Bike is further enhanced for the comfort and enjoyment of children thanks to the low step through for easy and safe access and an adjustable brake lever made specifically to fit the size and strength of a childs hands. A European style back pedal is also fitted so that children can brake the bike by simply pedalling backwards – using their leg strength, rather than their weaker hand strength, to efficiently and safely brake.

The Puky Z2 Red Kids Bicycle is suitable for children aged 3+ (from 95cm) with instep inside leg length from 40cm.

Lowest saddle position: 45 cm

Puky Z2 Childrens Bike Features

  • Low step through
  • Aluminium rims
  • Conical front tubing
  • Supporting wheels
  • Square axle drive
  • Back pedal brake hub
  • Caliper brake
  • Adjustable brake lever suitable for children's hands
  • Ball bearings on square axle drive, wheels, steering and pedals

Safety Features

  • Crash pad
  • Safety handlebar grips
  • Bell
  • Front and rear reflectors
  • Plastic edge protection on front mudguard
  • Impact resistant powder coating

Product Description:
Puky Z2 Children's Pink Bicycle with Stabilisers

A strong and beautiful first bike in a perky, girly colour the Puky Z2 Kids Bike in Pink will give children an unforgettable first bicycle of their own.

Providing the sort of safety and stability that’s so crucial for a child’s first cycling experience, the Puky Z2 Pink Kids Bicycle comes with a full safety set including a crash pad, bell and front and rear reflectors as well as stabilisers for added support.

The Puky Z2 Pink Childrens Bike is engineered specifically with the comfort and enjoyment of children in mind. With a low step providing safe, easy access and an adjustable brake lever made specifically to fit the size and strength of a child’s hands, the Puky Z2 is a manageable vehicle for little ones. A further back pedal is also fitted so that children can brake using their legs, rather than their hands, for a stronger and safer brake.

The Puky Z2 Pink Kids Bicycle is suitable for children aged 3+ (from 95cm) with instep inside leg length from 40cm.

  • Adjustable brake lever suitable for children's hands
  • Ball bearings on square axle drive, wheels, steering and pedals

Safety Features

  • Crash pad

Product Name: Thetford Porta Potti Portable Toilet Chemical Tank Freshener
Product Description:
1.5 L Thetford Tank Freshener

Rid unpleasant smells from the waste-water tank, shower, sink or wash basin of your caravan or motor home with the Thetford Tank Freshener, an effective maintenance fluid suitable for daily use on the waste-water tank and pipes.

Simply measure 50ml of Thetford Tank Freshener per 25L of waste water tank capacity and then add this measurement of Tank Freshener directly into the sink or drain required and allow it to work its magic!

Thetford Tank Freshener prevents and reduces deposits in the waste-water tank and pipes as well as the accumulation of grease and leaves waste-water tank refreshed and clean.

Thetford Tank Freshener Features

  • Reduces deposits and grease contamination in your waste water tank and tubing.
  • Prevents unpleasant smells
  • Improves hygiene
  • Promotes trouble-free discharge of your tank
  • Safe for all plastics
  • 1,5L bottle

*Please only ever use toilet chemicals as directed by the manufacturer.

Product Name: Thetford Porta Potti Aqua Kem Blue Portable Camping Toilet Chemical
Product Description:
Thetford 2 Litre Aqua Kem Blue Portable Toilet Chemical

The world's best selling toilet fluid

Powerful and easy to use, Thetford Aqua Kem Blue is the World’s best selling toilet fluid, suitable for daily use on the waste tank of your cassette or portable toilet.

Aqua Kem Blue not only suppresses unpleasant odours and reduces the build up of gas, but also stimulates the breakdown of solids and toilet paper to result in easier emptying. Keeping the waste-holding tank sanitary and fresh, Aqua Kem Blue also protects moving parts of camping chemical toilets and extends their general lifespan.

 A dose of Aqua Kem blue lasts 4-5 days with average use, giving you excellent long-lasting freshness. 

Thetford Aqua Kem Features:

  • Reduces gas buildup
  • 1 dose lasts up to 5 days
  • Liquefies waste for easy cleanup
  • Excellent odor control

*Please only ever use camping toilet chemicals as directed by the manufacturer.

Product Description:
Thetford Aqua Kem Green

For the environmentally conscious camper, Thetford Aqua Kem Green is an eco-friendly toilet fluid which biologically stimulates the breakdown of solids and toilet paper.

An excellent suppresser of unpleasant aromas and reducer of gas build up, Aqua Kem Green also protects moving parts and extends the lifespan of your portable toilet and is also safe to be emptied into a septic tank.

Thetford Aqua Kem Green Additional Features

  • Keeps the waste-holding tank pure and clean
  • Lasts approximately 4 days with average use
  • It remains liquid up to -20°C and remains active after defrosting
  • Awarded the Dutch eco-label Milieukeur and the German eco-label Der Blaue Engel
  • 1.5L Bottle

Tip

Travelling to Europe? many camp sites have now added the rule that chemical toilets should use only Aqua Kem Green.

Thetford Porta Potti Qube 145 – Portable Toilet for Camping & Campervans


The Thetford Porta Potti Qube 145 is a reliable and easy-to-use portable toilet for camping, campervans and off-grid living, and wild camping adventures. Compact and practical featuring a high-capacity waste tank and a natural seating height for maximum comfort. Lightweight and easy to store, the Porta Potti Qube 145 is perfect for anyone needing a portable, off-grid toilet solution.

The Thetford Porta Potti Qube 145 is equipped with a manual bellows flush pump, a secure cover-lock, and convenient carry handle on the holding tank, making emptying and transport quick and hassle-free. The Porta Potti Qube 145 has integrated pour-out spout for splash-free disposal.

  • Sleek design with a white finish
  • Manual bellows flush pump
  • High-capacity waste holding tank for fewer emptying trips
  • Integrated pour-out spout for easy mess-free disposal
  • Secure cover-lock to prevent leaks during transport

  • Easy to store, perfect for off-grid and wild camping

Product Name: Medium Fibre Optic LED Light Star Effect Ceiling Kit
Product Description:
Medium Fibre Optic LED Light and Halogen Star Effect Ceiling Kits

Ideal for use in small to medium rooms

The Medium Fibre Optic LED Light Star Effect Ceiling Kit comes complete with acrylic bullet lenses and silk screen washers. Tails can have lenses fitted or be left bare, lenses give a larger light and many people use this option when fitting the kit (drill size needed for lenses option is 3mm without lenses 1mm).

Options;

Twinkle wheel (Twinkling Star Lights)

This kit comprises halogen light box with twinkle wheel and tails.  Once turned on the wheel turns (inside the light box) in front of the light causing the twinkle affect which appears at the end of each tail.  Its “blue and white” twinkle wheel gives the best "twinkling star affect” for your ceiling. Each kit includes optional lenses, having a mix of lights with and without lenses randomly scattered across the ceiling adds to a "real" star affect.

Colour Changing (Manual Control)

This star ceiling kit has an LED light source (light box) and provides an RGBW sequence (red green blue white), it can be manually set on the light box to stay at a fixed colour or go through a set colour change sequence.  Remember you will need access to the box if you want to change the setting, if it’s in your loft you’ll have to get up to change it.

Colour Changing (with Remote Control)

This LED light star ceiling kit has a remote control which can turn the lights on/off, set a fixed colour or change to an RBG colour changing sequence, the brightness can also be adjusted with the remote. The LED light kits do not have a twinkling affect!

168 Light points

The Mediun Fibre Optic LED Light Star Effect Ceiling Kit features 168 Star Points with fibre lengths ranging from 2.0m to 3.0m and is available with a choice of three different light sources (Twinkle Wheel, Manual Colour Changer or Colour Changer with remote control). Please pick your selection using the option set at the top of the page prior to checkout.

MS168 Medium Star Kit Installation Manual

  • 1.00mm diameter in groups of 28 tails of the following lengths: 2.0m, 2.5m, 3.0m

Product Name: Disabled & Elderly Portable Toilet Aid with Folding Mobility Frame
Product Description:
Elderly & Disabled Dignity Toilet Aid with Folding Mobility Frame (Now with optional backrest)

A Portable and Dignified Toilet Aid with Supportive Folding Frame providing a luxurious, affordable & easier to use alternative to commodes

Thetford Porta Potti toilets and Compatible Mobility Folding Frames provide a comfortable and far less cumbersome alternative to commodes which grant people with restricted mobility or heightened toilet needs (such as the elderly, convalescents or the physically impaired) a sense of independence and dignity.

Which toilet aid and mobility frame combination should I go for?

All Thetford Porta Potti Toilets provide complete ease of use and comfort

However they all have a range of different heights, flush options and even individual features such as toilet roll compartments and level indicators which may or may not be important factors in what you require from a portable mobility toilet and frame.

 

As a brief guide, the Porta Potti Excellence is the most domestically styled and has the tallest height making them the easiest to get on and off of and so is perfect for people with severe physical impairments. Since it’s available with a touch button electric (battery powered) flush the Porta Potti Excellence is also great for people who might struggle with performing a manual flush (i.e. arthritis sufferers).

Both the Thetford Porta Potti 165 and Thetford Porta Potti 365 feature manual flushes, however whilst the 165 is a standard style porta potti toilet with bellows flush, the 365 has a pump action flush (which in our honest opinion also has the most solid and stable manual flush handle).

The Compatible Portable Toilet Folding Frame provides an approximate 10cm lift to the porta potti for extra stability and comfort and is compatible for use with the 165 Qube, 365 Qube and the Excellence (with manual or electric flush).

For more information about any of the Porta Potti toilets, please click on any of the products listed below.

How do I order?

Just use the drop down list (just above the "ADD TO CART" image on this page) to choose a toilet. The frame is included in the price and is also available on its own in the event that you already have access to a suitable Thetford toilet. You'll also need to buy some Thetford Toilet chemicals to keep the toilet working at full capacity, fresh and clean.

If you need any extra information or have any questions just ring us on 0151 334 0222 or watch the video at the bottom of the page.

VAT Refund

It’s likely that you’re eligible to claim back the VAT on the Portable Toilet Mobility Frame.

Click here to view and print out the form required and then simply fill it out and either send it back to us via post or by scanning the form and attaching the PDF in an email to us. We’ll then be able to refund you.

*Please not that Portable Toilets are NOT eligible for VAT exemption (only the frame).

Product Name: Camilla Catalytic Lenomex Mobile Gas Heater
Product Description:
Camilla Catalytic Lenomex Mobile Gas Heater

Offering a rapid heating system that can be easily moved from one space into another, the Camilla Catalytic Lenomex Mobile Gas Heater is a straight forward, safe and portable gas heater.

Featuring a push button start for instant ignition, the Camilla Catalytic Lenomex Mobile Gas Heater comes with a hose, fitted 21mm butane regulator and a re-enforced diaphragm.

Ideal for spaces which require flexible heating options between rooms, or even as a back up emergency heating option for when a main source of heating fails (e.g. in offices or schools), the Camilla Catalytic Lenomex Mobile Gas Heater is a reliable, convenient and fast heating solution.

Camilla Catalytic Lenomex Mobile Gas Heater

  • Push button start for instant ignition
  • Comes with fitted 21mm regulator with a re-enforced diaphragm
  • Heat settings: Max 3.4Kw, Med 2.7Kw, Min 2.3Kw
  • Max cylinder size 15kg
  • Features F.F.D (Flame Failure Device) and O.D.S (Oxygen Depletion System)
  • Suitable for use with calor and other LPG bottled gas
  • Supplied with hose and butane regulator
  • Use in a well ventilated area
  • Requires ventilation with at least 80cm2 of airflow
Product Availability: # Discontinued

Product Name: Mini Radiant 4.2kW LPG Mobile Gas Heater
Product Description:
Portable Mini Radiant Gas Heater

The Mini Radiant 4.2Kw LPG Mobile Gas Heater provides an instant and powerfully radiant heat with safety and reliability.

Supplied with a number of protective safety features including anti-tilt shut off, oxygen analyser safety shut off and 4 lockable wheels for easy mobility the Mini Radiant 4.2Kw LPG Mobile Gas Heater is an intuitively safe and easy to use model with Piezo ignition.

The Mini Radiant 4.2Kw LPG Mobile Gas Heater also comes with a hose and butane regulation

Mini Portable Gas Heater Features:

  • 4.2kw of heat output
  • 3 heat settings
  • Full anti tilt safety device & oxygen analyser
  • Piezo ignition
  • Sturdy lockable castors
  • Revolutionary base design folds in when cylinder not fitted to save space
  • Suits 7kg butane cylinders
  • Heater Dimensions: 38 x 34 x 58cm
  • Fully CE Approved
  • Supplied with hose and 21mm clip on regulator
  • Use in a well ventilated area
  • Requires ventilation with at least 80cm2 of airflow

Product Name: Manhattan Mobile LPG Heater Gas Fire
Product Description:
Manhattan Mobile LPG Heater Gas Fire

The Manhattan Mobile LPG Gas Fire Heater is a 3Kw flueless unit with a stylish, contemporary design and real flames.

Optimised for safety and complete ease of use, the Manhattan Mobile LPG Heater Gas Fire features wheels for easy transportation, Piezo ignition, 3 heat settings, simple cylinder load system and a flame failure device. To protect against carbon dioxide build up, an Oxygen Depletion System (O.D.S) safely cuts off the gas supply when oxygen and gas levels are determined to be wrong.

The Manhattan LPG Mobile Gas Fire Heater runs off either 7kg or 15kg gas cylinders and is an efficient pay as you go and portable heater, great for keeping long term costs down and fantastic for maintaining a chic household thanks to its sleek appearance.

Manhattan Mobile LPG Gas Heater Features

  • Max heat 3.0kw
  • 3 heat settings
  • Piezo Ignition
  • Oxygen Depletion System (O.D.S)
  • Flame Failure Device (F.F.D)
  • Easy cylinder load system
  • Dimensions H 690mm x W 380mm x D 430mm
  • Weight: 29Kg
  • Use in a well ventilated area
  • Requires ventilation with at least 80cm2 of airflow
Product Availability: #We are currently anticipating further stocks of the Manhattan LPG heater in late 2023.

Product Name: Kettler Suzuka Air Pedal Kids Go Kart with inflatable tyres
Product Description:
Kettler Suzuka Air Childrens Pedal Go Kart

The Suzuka Air kids go kart features high performance inflatable tyres, the Suzuka Air has an adjustable seat designed specifically to provide comfort and support to your child’s back, the Kettler Suzuka Air Go Kart is a stylish, sturdy and speedy pedal cart which little racers will love.

Suitable for children aged 4-8 years, the Suzuka Air Go Kart comes complete with such fantastic features as a handbrake and a free wheel facility so kids can feel in complete control as champions in the drivers seat!

A sleek pedal go kart with a vivid orange hue, the Kids Suzuka Air Go Kart can be relied upon for endurance and durability thanks to its scratch resistant polyester coating which will ensure for it’s attractive, supreme veneer to be enjoyed by the little speedy superstars at the helm of the terrific Suzuka air go kart for many years to come.

 

Suzuka Air Go Kart Key Features:

  • Kettler scratch resistant, fade-proof polyester coating
  • High quality steel tubing frame
  • Freewheel option
  • Dual rear handbrake
  • High performance inflatable air tyres
  • The Suzuka Air has easily adjustable and comfortably moulded seat
  • The Suzaka Air is suitable for ages 4-8 years (height guide 100-130cm)
  • Anti-Slip Pedals           
  • Suzuka Air Go Kart Built Dimensions: 100 x 61 x 64cm
  • Kettler Childrens Go Kart 3 Year Warranty

Product Name: Calor Mini Radiant Fire LPG Gas Heater
Product Description:
Calor Mini Radiant Fire LPG Gas Heater

Straight forward, safe and simple to use the Calor Mini Radiant Fire LPG Gas Heater comes with 2 heat settings, piezo ignition and has an approx burn time of 63 hours (based on usage on the lowest setting using a 7kg gas cylinder).

For safety and peace of mind the Calor Mini Radiant Gas Heater comes with F.F.D (Flame Failure Device) and O.D.S (Oxygen Depletion System) to protect against carbon monoxide build up and safely shut off the gas supply when gas and oxygen levels are determined to be wrong.

Calor Mini Radiant Gas Heater

  • 2 Heat Settings
  • Piezo Ignition
  • Heat Output: 3kW
  • Flame Failure Device (F.F.D)
  • Oxygen Depletion System (O.D.S)
  • Dimensions: (cm) 71x35.9x44
  • Approx Burn Time: 63hrs (*based on the lowest setting using a 7kg Cylinder)
  • Supplied with Hose & Regulator
  • Weight: 22kg
  • Use in a well ventilated area
  • Requires ventilation with at least 80cm2 of airflow

Product Description:
Deluxe Swing Ball Pro

Let the battle begin

Are you ready for a game of swing ball?  If you've played before you know the tactics, you start with the mind games by getting your racket and smashing the swing ball backwards and forwards just to intimidate your opponent before the game has even started.  Then there's a dispute about who go's backhand and forehand! It's all good fun! and a great aid for tennis training, helping to fine tune hand eye coordination

The sturdy base means no pole falling over!

Here's the good news, the Deluxe Rotor Spin Swing ball set JC-542A won't let you down by falling over halfway through the game thanks to its base which is filled with approximately 12kgs (12 Litres) of water, so there's no excuses, its a swing ball match to the end! no prisoners!

  • Pole height 1.8 metres
  • Pole Diameter 25.4mm
  • Base Diameter 42cm

Product Description:
Waeco W40 Mobicool Coolbox 12v/230v

Perfect for camping trips, picnics, motorhomes and caravans, the Waeco W40 Mobicool Cool Box provides an assortment of smartly designed and adjustable features alongside a 40 litre capacity unit to keep goods fresh and cool.

Featuring two separate lid sections for cold loss reduction, a multi functional handle for flexible mobility that makes the unit easy to either carry or pull alongside two handy wheels at the rear, the Waeco W40 Mobicool Cool Box is optimised for usability and practicality.

The Waeco W40 Mobicool Cool Box also has a number of features to keep the cooler tidy and easy to organise including 2 removable grids, fold away side handles and a cable compartment in the lid and a double fan and dual voltage system for easy power.

Mobicool W40 Coolbox features:

  • 4 A Peltier element
  • 2 wheels
  • Foldable multifunction handle and side carrying handles
  • Split lid to minimise cooling loss
  • Room for upright 2-litre bottles
  • 2 removable divider grids
  • Outer and interior fans

Smev AC539 Campervan Caravan Motorhome 12v Microswitch Tap w/ John Guest Tails
Product Description:
Smev AC539 Single Lever 12v Mixer Tap

Household quality and comfort combined with minimal weight from the plastic components, give these taps their versatile signature. The single lever cold and mixer SMEV AC539, have ceramic cartridges as used in household taps. Long life and quality are thus ensured.  With the finely adjustable lever you can regulate temperature and water flow precisely.

Micro switch

The mixer taps are supplied with a fitted micro switch, (switches can work with submersible pumps up to a 6 Amp rating) and are suitable for use with water pressure pumps up to 3 bar/43.5 psi.
Especially suitable for the use in sinks which have a built in glass or other material lid (overall height of tap when folded is 40 mm).  Fits most Smev sinks with a preformed tap hole, and can be used in some Spinflo [Thetford] Sinks. Please note the AC539 is not suitable for Cramer sinks.

Technical Specifications:

  • Base: 50 mm
  • Height: 40 mm (outlet folded down)
  • Overall spout length: 140 mm approx
  • Mounting hole: Ø 33 mm
  • Thread length: 35 mm
  • Thread -Ø: 1"
  • Pressure: 3 bar/43.5psi
  • Connection: John Guest - Standard 12mm Fitting

Featuring an attractive design and mixer faucet, the Whale Elegance Mixer Tap -RT2010- and Mixer Shower -RT2500- Combos, are suitable for use with all types of Whale pumps as well as our other pump brands. They are ideal for use in caravans, campervans, motorhomes, horseboxes and boats, even where space is limited. They will also fit the Contessa fold up sinks.

Product Name: Above Ground Swimming Pool Winter Debris Cover
Product Description:
Above Ground Swimming Pool Winter Debris Cover

Seal off your swimming pool from the decomposition of blown in debris, leaves and rubbish during the Autumn and Winter close down period with an Above Ground Swimming Pool Winter Debris Cover.

Maintain a clean pool with this high quality Above Ground Winter Debris Cover which fixes easily to your swimming pool and will save you hours worth of hard work when it’s time to open the pool back up in the Spring.  

Ideal for steel sided pools and Intex and Bestway frame pools.

*Please note: The Above Ground Swimming Pool Winter Debris Cover isn’t recommended for swimming pools with an inflatable ring around the top (e.g. Intex Easyset Pools) as the cover can slide off these pools.
Product Availability: The Above Ground Swimming Pool Debris Cover is sent on a Next Working Day delivery.

Product Name: Above Ground Swimming Pool Cover Saver Water Siphon
Product Description:
Swimming Pool Winter Cover Saver Water Siphon

The Swimming Pool Winter Cover Water Siphon takes the effort out of removing the water from above ground pool covers safely, simply and efficiently.

Free of electricity and any risk of shock, the Water Siphon for Swimming Pool Debris Covers effectively removes water from the top of Winter Debris Covers, stopping automatically when all the water is completely removed, and will also work to extend the lifespan of your Swimming Pool Winter Cover.   

Swimming Pool Cover Saver Water Siphon Features:

  • Includes drain, siphon pump, and 13' of hose.
  • When all water is removed from cover, siphon automatically stops
  • Electricity free
  • No garden hose required
  • Easy to use

How To Use:

  • Attach one end of the hose to cover the drain and then connect the opposite end to the siphon pump.
  • Put cover drain on top of cover
  • Hold the siphon pump and drain hose down below the level of the water on top of pool cover
  • Squeeze the siphon pump to start the flow water
Product Availability: The Swimming Pool Debris Cover Water Drainer is sent on a Next Working Day delivery.

Product Description:
CBE 230v 3 Pin 13A Socket

A standard UK socket rated at 230 Volts (13 Amps).

The CBE 230v 3 Pin 13A Socket has screw terminals for easy installation.

Please Note: House wiring cable (aka Twin & Earth, stiff grey cable) isn't suitable to be used to wire this item to caravans and motorhomes as house wiring isn't suitable for mobile applications (and is actually against IEEE wiring regulations). We advise that multi-stranded cable be used instead. This modular CBE unit can be mounted singularly or in combination with other CBE modules, but remember when installing where access to the back of the socket can be made, e.g. a bed locker, always use a back box to prevent possible shock! (back box included in purchase)
Product Availability: The CBE 230v 3 pin UK Socket is sent 2-3 working days

MicroLED 4000 LED Light Box For Fibre Optics

 Suitable for all sizes of Star Kits the UFO MicroLED 4000 Light Source features the very best in LED technology for an enduring, energy efficient and powerful multi-coloured illumination.

The MicroLED 4000 Light Source allows you to easily and quickly set specific moods at any given moment with the multi-colour touch wheel: an advanced RF remote control which gives you the freedom to switch to almost any colour imaginable in an instant.

Start and stop colour cycling on any colour with the remote control of the MicroLED 4000 Light source, which also features master / slave synchronisation and the ability to control more than one unit with the same remote control.

Product Name: MAXVIEW MXL003 Seeker Wireless Complete Satellite System
Product Description:
MAXVIEW MXL003 Seeker Wireless Complete Satellite System

The Maxview MXL003 Seeker Wireless Satellite System for Caravans and Motorhomes is at the forefront of the satellite system market, offering the ultimate in easy convenience alongside an abundance of performance boosting features including a unique wireless backlit LCD control panel which consistently feeds back antenna status to the user with animated display icons.

The wireless feature of the Maxview Seeker Satellite System also accommodates for unlimited mounting options and a simple installation, making problematic fixing jobs and unsightly, obtrusive cable runs non-existent.

The Maxview MXL003 control box is equipped with versatile mounting brackets to provide flexible installation options for whatever befits the requirements of your caravan or motorhome, and can also be used together with any satellite receiver (not included) for the ultimate package.

Available with either a 65cm satellite dish (MXL003/65) for use with receiving Freesat channels in the UK and Central Europe, or the larger 85cm (MXL003/85) version for an extended coverage area.

Please Note:

  • That this system does NOT include a satellite receiver- please see the related products section for information on our range of satellite receiver options.
  • This product comes in two different dish sizes (65cm & 85cm). Please use the drop down menu at the top of the page to maek your preference of dish prior to checkout.

  • Low Streamline Profile 17cm
  • "Easy Adjust" Manual Skew
  • Twin LNB as standard - Designed for use with SKY+ receiver or free to air receiver with hard drive recording. Alternatively can be used to feed two separate receivers for independent working
  • All weather resistant construction

Product Name: Caravan Motorhome Flexible Water And Waste Pipe
Product Description:
Caravan Motorhome and Campervan Hot, Cold and Waste Water Pipe

Complete your water system with this flexible water hose suitable for barbed water connections

This flexible pipe work is easy to use and easy to cut, available in sizes of 10mm, 12mm Hot and Cold water pipe as well as 20mm convoluted waste hose. This pipe work fits most barbed connections on cold water and mixer taps as well be it on a Whale/ Comet submersible pump or a Dometic, Shurflo or any other pressurised water pump and system.
 
Water pipes and waste pipe are available in different sizes in our shop. Siphons, [ wastes ] are available in different configurations and waste pipe sizes.

*Top tip! Immersing any pipe in hot water for a minute or two enables easy push fit of the pipes on to the tap or pump barbs, a good moulded seal being created when the pipe cools down!

Please Note: 10mm pipe will fit the Smev AC539 or Reich Trend A tap.

This pipework is not suitable for John Guest/SpeedFit Connections - it is only suitable for barbed connections.

Order quantity = Per Metre e.g. a quantity of 4 is 4m, a quantity of 5 is 5m etc.

Cold water pipe may be blue or clear.
Product Availability: Sent on a next day carrier!

Product Description:
CBE Electrical 4 Fuse Box Module

The CBE Electrical 4 Fuse Box Module is ideal for protecting four separate circuits where the user has chosen not to use an integrated Electrical Distribution Unit such as a Sargent Unit or Zig Unit .

The 4 Fuse Module, can also be used as a supplementary fuse board for a branch circuit or circuits, or when the Electrical Distribution Unit is 'full!' Supplied with 2 x 10 amp fuses, 1 x 15 amp fuse, and 1 x 20 amp fuse, the fuses can be swapped to any rating up to 20 amps in each slot. Just match your circuit to the minimum fuse size for maximum protection. The 4 Fuse Box Module can be used on it's own or in combination with any CBE Modular panel or switch.

Note - this fuse box now comes with translucent fuses (as shown in the pictures with a frame fitted).

Part # 270492

Product Name: Maxview Precision Portable Caravan and Motorhome satellite System 55 65 75cm dish
Product Description:
Maxview Precision Portable Caravan Tripod Satellite Dish

Taller, stronger, lighter and easier to set up than any other satellite system on the market, the Maxview Precision Portable Tripod Satellite System for caravans and motorhomes is an exceptional satellite set up for simple reception of UK and European television channels whilst you’re on your travels.

Featuring pre-assembled and easy to transport parts for a quick and easy set up, the Maxview Precision Portable Tripod Satellite System is supplied with straightforward illustrated instructions, an easy to follow guide for a quick set up and for further fast simplicity a compass, level indicator and integrated satellite finder.

Designed and manufactured in the UK specifically for touring vehicles such as caravans, Motorhomes and canal boats, the Maxview Precision Portable Tripod Satellite Dish comes in three size options (55cm, 65cm and 75cm), is available in either single or twin LNB options (twin option is for 2 TV's or SKY PLUS satellite receiver allowing a different channel to be recorded simultaneously) and is supplied with a two year guarantee.

Please Note:

  • That this system does NOT include a satellite receiver- please see the related products section for information on our range of satellite receiver options.
  • The Maxwell Precision Satellite System is available with two different dish size options and also as a single or double LNB variant. Please mark your preference of both at the top of the page prior to checkout.

KEY UNIQUE FEATURES

  • Pre assembled parts for quick easy set up (1)
  • Easy to read elevation indicator (2)
  • Magnetic LNB lock (3)
  • Integrated Sat Finder (4)
  • Level indicator (5)
  • Satellite zone - reduces margin for error
  • Available in twin or single LNB options
  • Dish size options 55cm 65 or 75cm
  • 2 year guarantee
  • Designed and manufactured in the UK

SUPPLIED WITH

  • Integrated Sat Finder
  • Compass
  • Tripod with Bag
  • Satellite Holdall
  • 10m Flexible Cable*
  • Universal LNB (see variants)
  • Ground Pegs
  • Elevation Map
  • Quick set up guide
  • Illustrated instructions

 
*New designed Flexible Cable. Multi strand core gives added cable flexibility.

  • Less likely to tangle
  • Less likely to take a set shape from storage
  • Enhanced cable handling
  • Compact cable storage
Product Availability: 2-3 working days

Product Description:
CBE MTB Caravan Motorhome Battery Test Panel.

The CBE Modular MTB Battery Test Panel is ideal for checking the battery strength of any Caravan, Motorhome, Campervan, Boat or indeed any vehicle where it is important to keep an eye on your leisure battery.

The CBE uses no power at all at rest, when the button is activated it shows the battery strength immediately with four clear LED lights, Red-Low Yellow 1- Getting Low, Yellow 2- Almost Charged, Green-Charged.

Can be mounted on it's own or as part of of a combination panel. New design shown in photos with outer frame fitted.
