Product Name: Maxview 54 Portable Satellite Kit for Caravans and motorhomes
Product Description:
Maxview 54cm Portable Satellite Kit

Designed specifically for touring vehicles such as caravans, motorhomes and canal boats, the Maxview 54cm Portable Satellite Kit is ideal for use in the UK and central Europe and is a complete kit with which to receive all available digital satellite TV and radio channels (when used in conjunction with a compatible satellite receiver).

Quick and easy to set up the Maxview 54cm Portable Satellite Kit is supplied with a straightforward zone map for simple dish alignment and a satellite compass and finder for a hassle free, uncomplicated set up and reception of channels.

The Maxview 54cm Caravan & Motorhome Portable Satellite Kit also comes complete with a Maxview Holdall for easy transportation as well as a universal LNB and folding LNB arm making packing the Maxview Portable Satellite Dish hassle free with a tidy, compact finish.

Please Note: That this system does NOT include a satellite receiver- please see the related products section for information on our range of satellite receiver options.

All Maxview Portable Satellite Kits Include

  • Maxview Portable Satellite Dish with Folding LNB Arm
  • Maxview Tripod Stand
  • Maxview Satellite Finder
  • Maxview Satellite Compass
  • Maxview Holdall
  • All required fixings
  • Can be used with a Free to Air or SKY receiver
  • Universal LNB & Folding LNB arm for storing into holdall
  • Easy to use zone map for dish alignment
  • 2 Year Guarantee

Easy Find and Receiver Kit

  • MXL020 (Easyfind Software)
  • Easyfind LNB
  • The "Easy Find" LNB supplied allows you to find a satellite easily
  • Just select the required satellite on the receiver menu, rotate the dish until the LED on the LNB turns solid green ignoring all other satellites
  • Ideal to use with portable systems
  • The LNB will only fit standard 40mm round feed cradles
  • Universal-LNB Noise figure 0,2 dB (Model MXL020/LNB only)
  • Free to Air Satellite Reciever

    Green LED: Selected satellite found
    Yellow LED: Stronger satellite signal needed or incorrect satellite
    Red LED: No satellite found

Product Name: Maxview Easyfind SD and HD Satellite Receivers PVR HDMI
Product Description:
Maxview SD and HD PVR Easyfind Satellite Receiver

Suitable for use with any Caravan and Motorhome Satellite Systems, the Maxview SD / HD PVR Easy find Satellite Receiver can be used to receive channels in the UK and throughout Europe without the hassle of costly subscriptions or contracts.

The Maxview SD/ HD PVR EasyFind Satellite Receiver couldn’t be easier to use; simply plug in and play, following the simple steps to set up your receiver and you’ll be able to watch all your favourite TV channels in no time at all!

Supplied with exceptional features such as a useful child lock, preset channel list (Astra 2 only) and in built satellite finder, the Maxview SD / HD Easyfind Satellite Receiver also comes supplied with a PVR (Personal Video Recorder) so you can easily record and manage all your favourite shows via a USB/ HDD (not included).  

Please note:

The Maxview HD Easyfind Satellite Receiver is now discontinued.

Maxview SD & HD Easyfind Satellite Receiver Features:

  • Receives all available SD (standard definition) TV channels
  • No contract, no subscription
  • Standard SD (Standard definition)
  • Receives over 200 UK digital TV and radio channels (off the ASTRA 2 satellite)
  • Receives 1000’s of European channels
  • PVR (Personal Video Recorder). Record and manage what you watch*
  • Supports Easy Find LNB
  • Plug and play - easy set up
  • Future proof - with free software updates via ASTRA 1 or USB connection
  • Easy to access USB port

Large Fibre Optic LED Light Star Effect Ceiling Kit
Option Set: Fibre Optic Star Kit Light Source
Product Description:
Large Fibre Optic LED Light and Halogen Star Effect Ceiling Kits

Using fibre optic ends of different diameters to produce an atmospheric near and far lighting effect, the Large Fibre Optic Star Kit is perfect for adding a unique lighting effect to homes and places of business.

The Large Fibre Optic LED Light Star Effect Ceiling Kit is perfect for a number of locations including showers, bathrooms, bedrooms, hallways, saunas, bed boards, floors, mirrors and even fabrics!

Options;

Twinkle wheel (Twinkling Lights)

This kit comprises halogen light box with twinkle wheel and tails.  Once turned on the wheel turns (inside the light box) in front of the light causing the twinkle affect which appears at the end of each tail.  Its “blue and white” twinkle wheel gives the best "twinkling star affect” for your ceiling. Each kit includes optional lenses, having a mix of lights with and without lenses randomly scattered across the ceiling adds to a "real" star affect.

Colour Changing (Manual Control)

This star ceiling kit has an LED light source (light box) and provides an RGBW sequence (red green blue white), it can be manually set on the light box to stay at a fixed colour or go through a set colour change sequence.  Remember you will need access to the box if you want to change the setting, if it’s in your loft you’ll have to get up to change it.

Colour Changing (with Remote Control)

This LED light star ceiling kit has a remote control which can turn the lights on/off, set a fixed colour or change to an RBG colour changing sequence, the brightness can also be adjusted with the remote. The LED light kits do not have a twinkling affect!

224 Light points

Large Fibre Optic LED Light Star Effect Ceiling Kit features 224 Star Points with fibre lengths ranging from 1.0m to 4.5m and is available with a choice of three different light sources (Twinkle Wheel, Manual Colour Changer or Colour Changer with remote control). Please pick your selection using the option set at the top of the page prior to checkout.

 

LS224 Large Star Kit Installation Manual

 

Our star kits are made in the UK

 

Frequently Asked Questions just click here

For any further enquiries or advice regarding any aspect of the Large Fibre Optic LED Light Star Effect Ceiling Kit, please feel free to give our team a call Mon-Fri on: 0151 334 0222.

Large Fibre Optic LED Light Star Effect Ceiling Kit Specifications:

  • 0.75mm diameter in groups of 20 tails of the following lengths: 1.0m, 1.5m, 2.0m, 2.5m, 3.0m, 3.5m, 4.0m, 4.5m
  • 1.00mm diameter in groups of 8 tails of the following lengths: 1.0m, 1.5m, 2.0m, 2.5m, 3.0m, 3.5m, 4.0m, 4.5m
  • Harness is made up of mixed diameter fibre - 0.75mm & 1mm - to give the star lights points a near & far effect.
  • Electrical Requirements: 2 standard household sockets - one to power the LED light source and one to switch the colour wheel on or off, this can be changed to wall switches (electrician needed).

Product Name: Dometic Waeco Coolpower M50U 12V Battery Voltage Monitor
Product Description:
Dometic Waeco Coolpower M50U 12V Battery Voltage Monitor

Protecting the battery of your caravan, motorhome or campervan from excessive charging, the Dometic Waeco Coolpower M50U 12v Battery Voltage Monitor is suitable for universal 12v applications with cigarette lighter style sockets as an output and features a voltage monitor integrated in the supply cable.

The Dometic Waeco Coolpower M50U 12v Battery Voltage Monitor also enables automatic cut-off at low battery voltage and cut-in at normal voltage with easy to read LED’s with which to monitor status.

Dometic Waeco Coolpower M50U Voltage Monitor features

  • Always the perfect battery voltage
  • Designed for universal use
  • Status read-out by LEDs
  • Ready for connection with cigarette lighter plug
  • Automatic cut-off or cut-in

Svensen SV9.0 Adjustable Swing Arm Caravan TV Bracket

This solid Svensen SV9 caravan television bracket is designed for flat screen LCD/LED TV's and is easy to install with an included built-in spirit level!

Product Name: Truma S3004 Caravan and Motorhome Gas Heater  - 12V Auto Ignition
Product Description:
Truma S3004 Caravan Motorhome LPG Gas Heater - 12V Auto Ignition

Providing a comfortable and safe heating solution for caravan, motorhome and statics, the Truma Trumatic S3004 Caravan & Motorhome Gas Heater is convenient and easy to use with an exceptionally economic consumption of gas (30 - 280g/h), replacing the Truma S3002.

The Truma S3004 Caravan and Motorhome Gas Heater is a simple to set up built in heater, and a 12 volt auto ignition. To heat your caravan or motorhome quickly and safely, the Truma Trumatic S3004 Caravan & Motorhome Gas Heater is an ideal and reliable solution.

Truma S3004 Caravan and Motorhome Gas Heater Benefits & Features:

  • 3500 Watts of heating
  • The Truma S3004 Gas Heater heats up a caravan or motorhome quickly.
  • Warm air ducts can be used with the optional fan kit,
  • Optional Mains 240 volt Ultraheat electric element, producing 500w 1Kw or 2kw of heating output.
  • Fresh air drawn in via the floor duct.
  • Exhaust duct through the vehicle roof,
  • 12 volt auto ignition
  • Combustion independent of room air, drawn through the floor (so there is little oxygen depletion or impact on the quality of air in the living area)
  • Installation box included

Product Name: Trumavent Blown Air Heating TEB 2 Fan
Product Description:
Trumavent Blown Air Heating TEB 2 Fan

Please click here to see TEB 3 Fan here which can be purchased with TEB 2/TEB 3 Adapter Plate

The Trumavent TEB2 Fan unit is used in conjunction with the Truma S3002/S5002 Caravan or Motorhome fires. 

The Trumavent Blown Air Heating TEB 2 Fan is a high quality add on heating accessory system for caravans, motorhomes and camper vans equipped with a Truma S3002 or S5002 fire. Heat is distributed around your caravan or motorhome via the Trumavent TEB 2 Heating Fan unit. The TEB 2 Fan pumps hot blown air to suitable outlet vents via flexible ducting. The unit fits within the front case of the fire.

Please Note -  this unit comes with the external control panel.

The latest model, the Truma TEB 3, can be found by clicking here.

Product Name: Truma Ultraheat Caravan Gas Heater Mains Element Kit for S Series Heaters
Product Description:
Truma Ultraheat Mains Heating Element Kit

A great addition to the Truma S / Trumatic S series Caravan gas heater, this unit allows you to upgrade your existing Truma S3004, S5002/S5004 fire so it can be mains electric powered with a thermostat control (Control panel & 3m connection cable included). The ultraheat has 3 power settings: 500w – 2.2A / 1000w – 4.5A / 2000w – 8.5A.

Truma Ultraheat Features:

  • 240 volt heating element, thermostat, control panel, 3 metre connection cable
  • Thermostatic control on each heat level setting, 500w, 1 Kw, 2 Kw
  • Extremely easy to program with a standard time switch
  • Straight forward installation
  • Heats up extremely fast, whatever the outside temperature
  • Blown air distribution with the optional TEB-3 Fan kit
  • Additional weight 2kg
Product Availability: The Truma Ultraheat S Series Gas Heater Mains Element kit is sent on a next working day carrier.

Product Name: Truma Trumatic S5002 Motorhome Gas Heater
Product Description:
Truma Trumatic S5002 Caravan Gas Heater

The big brother of the Trumatic S3002 Heater, the Truma S5002 Caravan Gas Heater benefits from the same fantastic features as the S3002 only with larger dimensions and more power!

A powerful and safe heater solution for caravans and motorhomes, the Trumatic S5002 Gas Heater provides a convenient comfort which is easy to use and features an impressively economic gas consumption (approx. 95% efficiency).

Simple to set up with a straight forward electrical connection by means of 12v voltage, the Truma Trumatic S5002 Gas Heater provides a reliable heat to caravans and motorhomes quickly, safely and with ease.

Truma Trumatic S5002 Caravan Gas Heater Benefits & Features

  • The Truma S5002 Heater heats up caravans, motorhomes and awnings quickly
  • Warm air ducts can be routed to meet your individual installation requirements
  • Fresh air drawn in via the side wall
  • Exhaust duct through the awning roof
  • Option of current-free operation without a fan
  • The Truma S5002 Heater comes supplied pre-installed in an installation box
  • Combustion independent of room air, closed combustion circuit  (so there are no oxygen shortages or poor quality air in the living area)

 

Unfortunately this item is no longer available and has been replaced by the Truma S3004, for any enquiries please call.

Product Description:
Propex Heatsource HS2800 Blown Air Heater

Designed for use in caravans, motorhomes, boats and horseboxes, the Propex Heatsource HS2800 Heater is an automatic thermostatically controlled blown air heating system fuelled by either Propane or Butane which provides heat totally independent of the engine.

The Propex HS2800 Blown Air Heater comes supplied with a solid state thermostat which automatically switches the heater on and off where necessary in order to maintain whatever temperature is desired. When the room temperature drops below the selected level the Heatsource of the Propex HS2800 Blown Air Heater will automatically ignite and run until the cabin reaches the desired temperature.

A clean and efficient heating solution for mobile and marine applications, the Propex HS2800 Heater is also designed for quiet running without having to compromise on performance.

Note: The image shown is with a marine kit, we DO NOT supply the marine kit. If you require a marine kit you will have to contact a marine specialist.

If you should happen to see this product cheaper elsewhere online, then give us a call on 0151 334 0222 and we'll try our best to match the price you've seen it for!

Propex HS2800 Blown Air Heater Economy & Consumption

Average Consumption 225 Grams / Hour
3.9 kg Propane Cylinder 17.5 hours
4.5kg Butane 20.0 hours
13kg Propane 58.0 Hours
15kg Butane 67.0 Hours
19kg Butane 84.5 Hours
47kg Butane 209.0 Hours
904 Camping Gaz (1.81kg) 8.0 Hours
907 Camping Gaz (2.72kg) 12.0 Hours

What do you get in each kit?

A single outlet vehicle kit (V1) contains

  • 1 x 1 metre 76mm ducting
  • 1 x 1 metre 26mm combustion inlet pipe
  • 1 x 0.75 metre 26mm Stainless Steel Exhaust pipe
  • 1 x Thermostat
  • 3.5 metres thermostat wiring harness
  • 3.5 metres 12v supply harness
  • 1 directional hot air outlet
  • 1 directional cool air return vent
  • hose clips, fasteners, screws, inline fuse, instructions, drilling template

A twin outlet vehicle fitting kit (V2) contains:

  • As a V1 kit with the addition of
  • 1 x open/close vent
  • 1 x Y branch
  • Extra metre of 76mm hot air ducting
  • Extra hose clips, fasteners and screws

A three outlet vehicle fitting kit (V3) contains:

  • As V1 + V2
  • And additional Y branch
  • An additional open/close vent
  • An extra meter of 76mm ducting – so 3 metres in total
  • Extra hose clips, fasteners and screws as required.
Product Availability: # Special Order - 7 to 10 Days

Product Name: Propex HS2211 External Blown Air Heater
Product Description:
Propex Heatsource External HS2211 Blown Air Heater

The Propex Heatsource External HS2211 Gas Heater is an automatic blown air heating system controlled by an easy to use thermostat and fuelled by butane / propane gas.

Designed to be mounted beneath your vehicle, the Propex Heatsource HS2211 External Blown Air Heater has various bracket fixings to allow for versatile positions and orientations for installation, increasing the number of fitting options available for the Propex HS2211 Heater beneath floors or even up between chassis rails.

With straight forward and intuitive controls providing easy heater control, the Propex Heatsource HS2211 External Heater makes it easy to manage desired temperatures and also features a constant heater feedback loop to enable for a quick and easy system diagnosis.

What do I get with each option?

A single outlet vehicle kit (V1) contains:

  • 2 metre 60mm APK ducting
  • 1 x 1 metre combustion inlet pipe
  • 1 x 0.75 meter Stainless Steel Exhaust pipe
  • 1 x Thermostat
  • 3.5 metres thermostat wiring harness
  • 1  hot air outlet
  • 1 cool air return vent
  • fasteners, screws, inline fuse, instructions.

A twin outlet vehicle fitting kit (V2) contains:

  • As a V1 kit with the addition of
  • 1 x open/close vent
  • 1 x Y branch
  • Extra metre of 60mm hot air ducting
  • Extra fasteners and screws

A three outlet vehicle fitting kit (V3) contains:

  • As V1 + V2
  • And additional Y branch
  • An additional open/close vent
  • An extra metre of 60mm ducting – so 4 metres in total
  • Extra hose clips, fasteners and screws as required.
Product Availability: #Dual outlet kits - please enquire to confirm availability

Product Description:
Dometic OV1800 Caravan & Motorhome Oven

The Dometic OV 1800 oven is the perfect compact mini oven for caravans, motorhomes and campervans with limited amounts of space to work with! Combining a sophisticated design with conveniently functional features the Dometic OV 1800 oven is uniquely sized for a practical and economic fit.

Featuring heat protection glass with a panorama window so you can easily keep an eye on how food is cooking within, the Dometic OV 1800 oven also contains a sturdy tray and grid and a bottom hinged door for easy functionality.

With electronic ignition and a simple thermostat with which to easily manage temperature the Dometic OV 1800 oven is a straight forward and compact LPG gas caravan oven with a chic design.

This is a self ventilating oven which makes it ideal for van conversions or projects where installing ventilation isn't always an option!

Features include:

  • Heat resistant door
  • Interior light
  • Enamelled baking tray
  • Stainless steel rack
Product Availability: Special Order 1 to 3 weeks

Product Name: Dometic CFX2 37 AC/DC Portable Compressor Cool Box
Product Description:
Dometic CFX2 37 AC/DC 12v Compressor Cool Box

Portable Camping Fridge Freezer

The Dometic CFX2 37L is a portable compressor cool box offering exceptional cooling and freezing performance in a compact design. This premium, heavy duty fridge/freezer has a 37l capacity allowing you to enjoy cold food and drinks anywhere. Designed to last, its rugged design and robust build features reinforced corners, stainless steel hinges, and a strong, removable lid, making it ideal for demanding outdoor use.

With a high performance compressor and variable motor speed, the Dometic CFX2 cooler delivers seamless temperature control between +20°C and -22°C, offering exceptional flexibility for your cooling needs. The Dometic CFX2 compressor camping fridge freezer features a user-friendly app, digital display and optimized power consumption making this mid-sized powered cooler perfect for camping, road trips and extended outdoor adventures. Battery protection prevents excessive vehicle discharge, ensuring peace of mind on extended trips. The Dometic CFX2 37 portable compressor cool box is adaptable to both mobile and home use, with the flexibility to connect to 12/24v DC for vehicles or 100–240v AC, ensuring reliable cooling wherever you are.

Dometic CFX2 Compressor Cooler Features:

  • Compressor cooler - VMSO3 Cooling Technology
  • Easy to use interface - 4-Digit LED with soft touch buttons and dim light setting
  • Removable lid - Aluminium hinges & hardware. Reversible. Non-slip logo pad
  • Rugged construction - Reinforced Corner Protection
  • Folding handles - Ergonomic foldable carry handles
  • Internal LED light - For interior illumination
  • USB charging - Charge small electronics
  • Battery Protection - Prevents excessive vehicle battery discharge
  • Connectivity - Control and monitor temperature via the Dometic Mobile Cooling App
  • Organised storage - Removable wire basket for efficient storage
  • Easy to clean - drain plug for quick and easy cleaning
  • Smooth Click Shut - Easy One-Hand operation

Product Name: Dometic CTS 4110 Caravan Motorhome Cassette Toilet
Product Description:
Dometic CTS 4110 Caravan Motorhome Cassette Toilet

Boasting a space efficient design that also replicates the comfortable shape, height and material of a home toilet, the Dometic CTS 4110 Motorhome Cassette Toilet is a free standing toilet model with a rear console.

Handy wheeled waste tank

Featuring a wheeled caddy tank with a solid double-strut telescopic handle making it easy to transport and empty due to its handy tank level indicator (including a visual warning signal for when the tank has been removed) for complete ease of use and maintenance of your motorhome.

Rotates left and right

For maximum versatility the seat of the Dometic CTS 4110 Caravan Ceramic Toilet can be rotated stepwise up to 90° in both directions (in steps of 15°) accommodating the toilet for corner installation.

Have a look at the video

Dometic CTS 4110 Motorhome Cassette Toilet Features:

  • Scratch resistant & easy to clean ceramic inlay within the toilet
  • Control panel with level indicator
  • Effective flush of the Dometic CTS 4110 Ceramic Cassette Toilet provided by flush water nozzles around the bowl
  • Prepared for SOG motorhome exhaust system
  • Compared to common products the round seat of the Dometic CTS 4110 Motorhome Cassette Toilet gains 8 cm of depth in the narrow space of the bathroom
  • Wheeled caddy tank
  • Relies on an onboard water tank for the flush feed. For the model with an inegrated flush tank see the CTW 4110
  • Tank Monitor.
  • Waste Tank Capacity 19 litres

Please note: The CTS 4110 Toilet is the updated version of the Dometic CTS 3110.

A fantastically comfortable free standing motorhome toilet with a rear console and integrated flush water tank, the Dometic CTW 4110 is built for comfort and ease of use

Product Name: Waeco Coolfreeze CF80 Dual Zone Compressor Fridge/Freezer
Product Description:
Waeco Coolfreeze CF80 Dual Zone Compressor Fridge Freezer (DISCONTINUED)

 

FOR THE NEAREST REPLACEMENT MODEL PLEASE SEE THE CFX RANGE

A triple compartment compressor fridge freezer ideal for caravans, motorhomes and camping trips

Incorporating a fridge, freezer and dairy section within its massive 76 litre capacity, the Waeco CF80 Dual Zone Compressor Fridge Freezer provides a convenient and efficient versatility with which to keep food and drink fresh whilst on your travels!

The CF80 is a resourceful portable fridge freezer boasting an efficient set of features

The CF80 Dual Zone Compressor Fridge and Freezer is packed full of fantastic user friendly features such as a secure locking mechanism as well as a soft touch operating panel with which to manage temperature and function of the fridge freezer with ease.

Also included with the CF80 compressor fridge freezer is 3 stage battery protection and VMSO (Variable Motor Speed Optimisation) providing Soft Start and Auto Turbo functions so that the temperature of the Waeco CF80 Compressor Fridge Freezer can be reached quickly, easily and maintained without wearing down the components of the fridge/freezer in the process.

 Waeco CF80 Compressor Fridge Freezer Features

  • Lockable digital control thermostat 'Set & Forget' (Memory Function).
  • Built in three stage fridge freezer battery protection.
  • VMSO (Variable Motor Speed Optimisation) with Soft start and Auto Turbo function.
  • Emergency function.
  • Flush mounted evaporator plate.
  • Interior LED light.
  • Two removable wire baskets.
  • Sturdy handles (which act as tie down points on the Waeco CF80 Fridge Freezer).
  • The CF80 also features a detachable lid (Screw-on lid mount, variable left/right).

Product Name: Waeco Coolfreeze CF110 Portable Fridge Freezer
Product Description:
Waeco Coolfreeze CF110 Portable Fridge Freezer (DISCONTINUED)

An exceptionally quiet running portable fridge the Waeco Coolfreeze CF110 Fridge Freezer is a powerful and jumbo capacity portable fridge freezer unit designed to operate in any continent with four voltage ranges: 12vdc, 24vdc, 100vAC and 240vAC.

The Coolfreeze Fridge Freezer Range is powerful and efficient, the Waeco Coolfreeze CF110 is a portable fridge freezer with user friendly features

Featuring a touch button micro processor key pad, digital temperature display (with full thermostatic adjustment) as well as Coolfreeze Special Electronics with Soft Start and a Turbo Button feature to speed up cool down time, the Waeco Coolfreeze CF110 Fridge Freezer is optimised for a complete ease of use.

This Portable Fridge Freezer is ideal for both domestic and commercial use and is a perfect refridgeration and freezer solution for caravans, motorhomes or boats with a generous 106 litre capacity to utilise for food and drink.

Still powerfully effective even at high ambient temperatures of up to 42 degrees ambient, the C110 Fridge Freezer provides amazingly low energy consumption on dc battery.

CF110 Portable Fridge Freezer Features

  • Danfoss BD50F compressor with integrated control electronics
  • Electronic thermostat
  • Low voltage protection / electronic fuse
  • Automatic reverse pole protection
  • Intelligent, automatic CF110 turbo cooler
  • 3-stage battery protection
  • 4-digit display (display readout in Celsius or Fahrenheit) and control panel
  • Status and error indication by 2 separate LEDs
  • CF110 Coolfreeze memory function saves the last settings
  • Jumbo heavy duty portable compressor cooler delivering +5 to +10 degrees refrigeration
  • -18°C 3 star Freezer (***) providing deep freezing with the ability to deep freeze chilled food from purchase
  • Freezer capable of storing *** freezer food safely for a period of up to 3 months with minimal dc energy consumption.

Product Name: Dometic CK2000 Caravan Cooker Hood Extractor Fan
Product Description:
Dometic CK 2000 Caravan Cooker Hood Extractor Fan

The first air circulating cooker hood in the caravan and motorhome industry, the Dometic CK2000 is a Cooker Hood Extractor Fan which is easy to install and exceptionally efficient.

With a 50 m³/h capacity, Circulair provides a more efficient performance than conventional caravan hoods with the Dometic CK2000 Cooker Hood Extractor Fan still offering a low DC consumption of only 5W.

With the Dometic CK2000 Cooker Hood Extractor Fan cleaned air is returned downwards whilst suction is concentrated along the edges creating an air dome which stops fumes from escaping, making roof mounted ventilators no longer necessary!

Dometic CK2000 Caravan Cooker Hood Extractor Fan

  • Lateral air suction of the Dometic CK2000 Hood Extractor Fan ensures efficient performance with 50 m³/h
  • The Dometic CK2000 Cooker Hood Extractor Fan has an easy installation as no roof-mounted ventilator is necessary
  • Washable grease filter and exchangeable carbon filter
  • Snap-on-releases for easy access to filters and lamps
  • With 2 fan-speed regulation and integrated halogen lights

Product Description:
Waeco Coolmatic MDC50 Compressor Fridge

Product Name: Dometic Fridge White Vent Kit LS100 LS200
Product Description:
Dometic LS100 & LS200 Caravan Fridge Vent System Kit

Avoid the energy wasting heat build-up that can occur behind your caravan or motorhome fridge with the Dometic Fridge Vent LS100 & LS200 System Kit which provide two different modules of efficient ventilation.

The upper ventilation system of the LS100 Caravan Fridge Vent System kit allows heated air to easily escape via the ventilation grille, whilst the LS200 Vent System permits cool air from the outside to the rear of the fridge. Both the LS100 and LS200 Caravan Fridge Vent System Kits save vital energy and help to support the cooling performance. A mounting frame, ventilation grille and a winter cover are also included in both of the caravan fridge vent kits.

The LS100 and LS200 Caravan Fridge Vent System Kits are suitable for all single-door absorption fridges and are designed for easy maintenance without needing to remove the fridge.

Please note: Only the correct installation of both ventilation grilles ensures for the optimum performance of your caravan fridge.

Sophisticated & slim line, the Waeco WC08 Coffee Maker is the perfect size for caravans & motorhomes

Dometic Waeco MC01 One Cup 12v Perfect Coffee Machine

Specially designed for mobile use, the Waeco MC01 One Cup Coffee Machine is ideal for use in commercial or leisure vehicles for people who love a proper fresh cup of coffee straight from the bean who don't need to brew up for anyone else!

The MC01 12v Coffee Machine for is perfect for drivers who enjoy a fresh brew whilst on the go

Featuring a compact and stylish design the Waeco MC01 12v Coffee Machine is the perfect size to fit into cars, trucks or caravans without using up an unnecessary amount of space and is a fantastic investment for drivers sick of paying out for flavourless service station coffees.

For ultimate safety, convenience and energy efficiency the MC01 12v Coffee Machine automatically turns off once your coffee has brewed and also provides boil dry machine protection and a handy MC01 status indicator.

Dometic Waeco MC01 12v Perfect Coffee Machine features include

  • Quick brewing time
  • Status indicator
